I fixed the NPE in PDE.
However, it still doesn't switch to the Plug-in Development perspective.  This 
is a Platform/UI issue.

PDE has fixed the NPE pasted above.

The problem that remains is the fact that perspective switching fails if no 
perspective is currently open.
Tod, this is a Platform/UI issue, isn't it?
Yes - you should log us a bug.

Marking as fixed as the NPE was addressed by PDE.

Opened bug 57190 against Platform/UI to address the failure in perspective 
switching.
